title: Haibara-Kun Wa Gokigen Naname
alternative_title: Haibara Is In A Bad Temper;Haibara Kun Wa Go Kigen Naname; Haibara-kun Is In A Bad Mood;Haibara-kun Wa Go Kigen Naname;Haibara-kun wa Gokigennaname;灰原くんはご機嫌ななめ;灰原君一脸嫌弃地看着我;하이바라는 성격이 까칠해
status: Haibara Is In A Bad Temper;Haibara Kun Wa Go Kigen Naname; Haibara-kun Is In A Bad Mood;Haibara-kun Wa Go Kigen Naname;Haibara-kun wa Gokigennaname;灰原くんはご機嫌ななめ;灰原君一脸嫌弃地看着我;하이바라는 성격이 까칠해
description:
Description :
        Although Mio wanted to become good friends with Haibara-kun who transferred to her class. But the first impression she received was the worst ever! But since with her grades, she was in danger of getting retained for a year, she has to go beg Haibara-kun to help tutor her??
